sentences.english: Trivial tributes constitute the attribute of constituent's report.
sentences.chinese: 琐屑的颂词形成选民的报告的属性。

sentences.english: Trivial tributes constitute the attribute of constituent' s report.
sentences.chinese: 琐屑的颂词形成选民的报告的属性。

sentences.english: Back to my trivial, busy, this is me to omit.
sentences.chinese: 回到我的琐屑之中，忙碌着，这是我无以省略的。

sentences.english: trivial tributes constitute the attribute of constituent's report.
sentences.chinese: 琐屑的颂文形成选平易近的陈诉的属性。

sentences.english: This is so that the process is not held up for frivolous reasons.
sentences.chinese: 这是使这一进程是没有举行了琐屑的原因。

sentences.english: Trivial tributes constitute the attribute of constituent’s report.
sentences.chinese: 琐屑的颂词形成选民的报告的属性。

sentences.english: You make a big election about small things.
sentences.chinese: 你为一些琐屑的事情进行大的选举。

sentences.english: How much worse it would be if we are saying inappropriate things or engaging in idle chatter.
sentences.chinese: 更罔论是谈不适当的话，或是无聊琐屑的事了。

definition: miscellaneous/mixed and disorderly (of writing)/disordered and confusing/mixed-up and illogical
lit. firewood, rice, oil and salt/fig. life's daily necessities
lit. chicken feathers and garlic skins (idiom)/fig. trivial (matter)
to float about/(of a feeling) to show on the face/(of speech, friendship etc) shallow/vague
lit. firewood, rice, oil, salt, soy, vinegar, and tea/fig. life's daily necessities
pinyin: chai2 mi3 you2 yan2 jiang4 cu4 cha2

definition: diverse and complicated (of one's affairs)/prolix (of speech, writing etc)
